subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: David Clarkson scored two power-play goals as the Devils bounced back from blowing a two-goal lead in the third period to beat the Rangers, 3-2, in a preseason shootout in Newark. Travis Zajac scored in the sixth round of the shootout to lift the Devils in their preseason opener under Coach Jacques Lemaire.
